comments.author: mounir@lamouri.fr
comments.text:
Currently. when the value changed state change for one radio element, the change is propagated to all elements inside group. The same way, when trying to get this state, we try to walk into the group and get the first element (that is not the one requesting the state).

I don't think that would be a real performance improvement but it sounds to be a better design to have this saved by the group container.
comments.raw_text:
Currently. when the value changed state change for one radio element, the change is propagated to all elements inside group. The same way, when trying to get this state, we try to walk into the group and get the first element (that is not the one requesting the state).

I don't think that would be a real performance improvement but it sounds to be a better design to have this saved by the group container.
